Translations.Text: Eteke chuparaichakaraisakalara chuparaiche sihamtara kono upakara nakaraiba
Eteke sihamtara ki haiche, kiya sihamte upadesa banira paraa bimukha haiche
sihamte yena bhita-santrasta hai palayanarata banaraiya gadha
Yiborae sinhara bhayata palayana karaiche
Baram sihamtara majara pratyeka byaktiye'i kamana karae ye taka unmukta grantha pradana karaa ha'oka
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram sihamte akhiraataka bhaya nakarae
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'i kora'ana sakalorae babe upadesabani
Eteke yara iccha si iyara paraa upadesa grahana karaka
Arau allahara icchabihina konorae'i upadesa grahana karaiba noraarae teraemi bhayara yogya, kerala te'omrae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa, arau teraemi ksama karaara adhikarai
Ma'i sapata karaicho kbiyamatara dinara
ma'i arau sapata karaicho atmanindakarai atmara
manuhe bharae neki ye, ami ketiya'o tara asthisamuha ekatraita karaiba noraaraima
kiya noraaraima, ami tara anulira agrabhagasamuhako (pababorako) punarbin'yasta karaibalai saksama
Baram manuhe tara bharaisyate'o papakarma karaibalai bicarae
Si prasna karae, kiyamatara dinato ketiya ahiba
yetiya caku sthira hai yaba
arau candra kiranabihina hai paraiba
arau yetiya surya arau candraka ekatraita karaa ha’ba
se'idina manuhe ka’ba, ‘aji palabalai sthana ka’ta’
Ketiya'o nahaya, kono asrayasthala na'i
Se'idina tha'i ha’ba kerala tomara pratipalakara ocarata
Se'idina manuhaka arahita karaoraa ha’ba si agalai ki pathiya'ichila arau pichata ki thai ahiche
Baram manuhe nije'i nijara bisaye samyaka aragata
yadi'o si nana ajuhata dekhuraaya
Tatataiyakai ahi ayattba karaara babe tumi tomara jibhaka drauta sancalana nakaraiba
Niscaya iyara samraksana arau patha karaoraara dayitba amarae'i
Eteke ami yetiya iyaka patha karao tumi tetiya se'i pathara anusarana karaa
tara pichata iyara barnanara dayitba niscitabharae amarae'i
